falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Claim that apply-result should be routed via registry rather than window_service directly
falsificationQueries: Search for existing apply-result registry or generic handler
Check if window_orchestrator.recordSuccess is already used by llm_calls services
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: Registry exists only for requeue. Apply-result still calls window_service directly from llm_calls services. recordSuccess exists but is not used by llm_calls. Thus the coupling remains.
